pages.text: Tired of waiting for those tiny fragile babees to grow up? Use the incubator to speed up the process. Simply put the BaBee in a cage, and insert it in into the incubator together with a bunch of honey treats.
Another use for the Incubator is to infuse an egg with a specific bee type gene to get a spawn egg of that bee type. The bee type gene you obtain through the genetics setup.
